Docs.summary: Defines the support types for Microsoft UI Automation infrastructure. These support types are for implementing Microsoft UI Automation support for a custom control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This namespace documentation contains only .NET projections of Windows Runtime (WinRT) types where the projection differs from the WinRT type. To see the complete list of types for this namespace, see [Windows.UI.Xaml.Automation](https://docs.microsoft.com/uwp/api/windows.ui.xaml.automation) in the UWP API reference.
